title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1980.0 - Preamble
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1980.0 - Preamble

State Regulations

The Central New York Regional Transportation Authority
(CNYRTA, Centro, or the Authority), in furtherance of its mission, hereby
creates these Rules governing the conduct and safety of the public in the use
and operation of its transit services. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register July 10, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 28, eff. 7/10/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
